name: Filtering profanity for valid texts after adding new invalid profanity string

testSteps.description: 1: Filtering profanity for valid texts after adding new invalid profanity string ({text=this is awesome, format=json, profanity String=this,some, replacement char=$, error=Invalid User Replacement Characters})

children.description: When Siva requests a "this is awesome" after filtering using new "this,some" by replacing with "$" character in "json"
Filter input text this is awesome by adding new text this,some by replacing $ char in response format json

restQuery.responseHeaders:
Content-Type: application/json
Access-Control-Allow-Origin: *
X-Cloud-Trace-Context: 7b16b2df1f4f6a88a6bbf7a678882c8c
Date: Sun, 18 Jul 2021 21:33:15 GMT
Server: Google Frontend
Content-Length: 47

children.description: Then he should be shown an "Invalid User Replacement Characters" message in requested "json"
Validate response 'error' Invalid User Replacement Characters in format json

testSteps.description: 2: Filtering profanity for valid texts after adding new invalid profanity string ({text=this is awesome, format=xml, profanity String=this, replacement char=twentycharacterlimitcheck, error=Invalid User Replacement Characters})

children.description: When Siva requests a "this is awesome" after filtering using new "this" by replacing with "twentycharacterlimitcheck" character in "xml"
Filter input text this is awesome by adding new text this by replacing twentycharacterlimitcheck char in response format xml

testSteps.description: 3: Filtering profanity for valid texts after adding new invalid profanity string ({text=this is awesome, format=plain, profanity String=a,a,a,a,a,a,a,a,a,a,a, replacement char=*, error=User Black List Exceeds Limit of 10 Words.})

children.description: When Siva requests a "this is awesome" after filtering using new "a,a,a,a,a,a,a,a,a,a,a" by replacing with "*" character in "plain"
Filter input text this is awesome by adding new text a,a,a,a,a,a,a,a,a,a,a by replacing * char in response format plain
